block.extra_terracotta_utilities.silk_to: Silk Touching Magenta Glazed Terracotta Uncovered
Sneak to place in opposite direction.
block.extra_terracotta_utilities.allayed: The terracotta that combines the ability of Allay.
It can filter specific item drops from back to front in one block range.
Right click the block with the item to set filters.
block.extra_terracotta_utilities.explosi: The terracotta that is similar to TNT but is controllable and reusable.
It can blast the block in front of it into drops.
What the block will drop is the same as the TNT's.
Activate it with redstone signal. (impulse not necessary)
block.extra_terracotta_utilities.enhance: It contains the power of wither and can break down obsidian. (%.0f resistance)
block.extra_terracotta_utilities.enderiz: The terracotta that can instantly transport the block from back to front just like enderman's picking and placing blocks.
It can transport fluids as well.
block.extra_terracotta_utilities.powered: The terracotta that can transport entities through the direction of the arrow. (item drops as well)
block.extra_terracotta_utilities.haunted: The cursed terracotta that can give souls to certain blocks and transform them into creatures. (REI supported)
Place the certain block on it and wait for transformation.
block.extra_terracotta_utilities.spinnin: The terracotta that has similar property as sunflower.
It will rotate the block upon and change its horizontal direction.
block.extra_terracotta_utilities.entropy: Unlike %s, this terracotta will slowly freeze water or items in front it into a more stable state.
1. It can freeze the water in front of it into ice. (floating water as well)
2. It can freeze the item in front of it into a block state,
in other words placing the block. (Make sure only one item at a time!)
Only when there's ice block behind it will it function! (block with "ice" tag)
It has a %d%% chance of melting the ice behind it.
block.extra_terracotta_utilities.sticky_: It's like a compressed slime block, which will send entities stepped on it high into the sky! (item drops as well)
block.extra_terracotta_utilities.wooden_: Dirt, roots and logs give the terracotta an infinite breath of life.
It will grow logs, leaves and even itself on top of it.
It only grows if there's a dirt block underneath! (block with "dirt" tag)
block.extra_terracotta_utilities.silk_to: It can break the block down with its "silk touch".
But the silk cover also makes it vulnerable to the explosion.
It has a %d%% chance of blowing up its cover.
Activate it with redstone signal. (impulse not necessary)
If it's cover is worn out, it won't function.
Use wool or carpet on it to recover it. Dispenser also works.
If not worn out, the block will emit redstone signal of level 15 for comparator.
